alert.note: Alert for Dearborn; Franklin (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued March 03 at 4:00PM EST until March 04 at 7:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...The National Weather Service in Wilmington has issued a Flood Advisory for the following rivers... Whitewater River at Brookville. ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM THIS AFTERNOON TO SATURDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Whitewater River at Brookville. * WHEN...From this afternoon to Saturday evening. * IMPACTS...At 16 to 17 feet, Lowland flooding can be expected near Cedar Grove and New Trenton, with lowland flooding also occurring in West Harrison, Indiana and Harrison, Ohio. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 2:45 PM EST Friday the stage was 8.8 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 17.5 feet early Saturday morning. - Action stage is 14.0 feet. - Flood stage is 20.0 feet. &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Stay tuned to developments by listening to NOAA Weather Radio. For additional details on river forecasts, visit water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=iln
